title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin continues to react to Sean Payton stepping down as head coach of the Saints after 16 seasons and what's next for the Super Bowl champion as he takes a break from the NFL sidelines. He points out the biggest issue he has with Aaron Rodgers after his poor performance in the post season after another stellar regular season. Plus, NFL Network and former QB David Carr joins the show to share a surprising message about his brother, Derek Carr, and what he expects from the Raiders organization.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
